rules.text: Bot accounts are generally not permitted. Ask first.
Chinwag is for people, not brands. Sign up as yourself, not your project.
Don't upset the regulars. The longer you've been here, the more slack you get.
No harassment or bullying allowed, ever.
We're not prudes, but don't get overly sexual without Content Warnings.
We're mostly Australians and don't fucking care if you swear a bit.

records.text: What “unnecessary” complication have you put in a story?#WritingPromptIn a series I’m sloooowly working on, the humans start the year on the vernal equinox and count the years as “The Xth year in the Reign of King Whoever.” The dragons, start the year on the winter solstice, and just count the years since they started recording history some 6,000 years ago. And then the centaurs … well, I haven’t worked that out yet, except they have two calendars used by different parts of their population.
